about_the_game:
Add a new customer, an enigmatic young girl who sports vibrant tattoos and never leaves her home without her trusty tablet. With a penchant for exotic dishes and an appetite for technology, she adds a fresh, quirky charm to the gameplay. Harness the power of technology to cater to her diverse tastes, from traditional comfort food to sci-fi inspired dishes. The unique customer comes with three distinct emotional states. Pay close attention as her moods swing from delighted, intrigued, to frustrated.

To aid you on your journey, this DLC offers an additional stash of precious rubies and coins. Use these riches to upgrade your kitchen and keep your menus exciting.
detailed_description:
Add a new customer, an enigmatic young girl who sports vibrant tattoos and never leaves her home without her trusty tablet. With a penchant for exotic dishes and an appetite for technology, she adds a fresh, quirky charm to the gameplay. Harness the power of technology to cater to her diverse tastes, from traditional comfort food to sci-fi inspired dishes. The unique customer comes with three distinct emotional states. Pay close attention as her moods swing from delighted, intrigued, to frustrated.

To aid you on your journey, this DLC offers an additional stash of precious rubies and coins. Use these riches to upgrade your kitchen and keep your menus exciting.
name: Cooking Live - Geek Girl (Free DLC)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cater to an intriguing, tech-loving girl with dynamic emotions. Get rubies and coins for kitchen upgrades, and serve up a culinary delight!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
